projects.name: zenoh
projects.description: zenoh unifies data in motion, data in-use, data at rest and computations. It carefully blends traditional pub/sub with geo-distributed storages, queries and computations, while retaining a level of time and space efficiency that is well beyond any of the mainstream stacks.

projects.name: zenoh-plugin-dds
projects.description: A zenoh plug-in that allows to transparently route DDS data.  This plugin can be used by DDS applications, such as ROS2 robotic applications and others, to leverage the zenoh for geographical routing or for better scaling discovery.

checks.name: main / Enforce referencing a closing issue

projects.name: zenoh-plugin-mqtt
projects.description: A Zenoh plug-in that allows to integrate and/or route MQTT pub/sub with Eclipse Zenoh.

checks.name: main / Enforce referencing a closing issue

projects.name: zenoh-plugin-webserver
projects.description: A zenoh plug-in implementing an HTTP server mapping URLs to zenoh paths. This plugin can be used to set-up a Web server where the resources are retrieved from geo-distributed zenoh storages, each leveraging various backends (file system, database, memory...)

projects.name: zenoh-backend-s3
projects.description: Backend and Storages for Zenoh using AWS S3 API

projects.name: zenoh-backend-filesystem
projects.description: Backend and Storages for zenoh using the file system

projects.name: zenoh-backend-influxdb
projects.description: Backend and Storages for zenoh using InfluxDB

projects.name: zenoh-backend-rocksdb
projects.description: Backend and Storages for zenoh using RocksDB
